name: viennarna

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: sse
variants.description: Enable SSE in order to substantially speed up execution

description:
The ViennaRNA Package consists of a C code library and several stand-
alone programs for the prediction and comparison of RNA secondary
structures.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: libsvm
dependencies.description:
Libsvm is a simple, easy-to-use, and efficient software for SVM
classification and regression.

dependencies.name: gsl
dependencies.description:
The GNU Scientific Library (GSL) is a numerical library for C and C++
programmers. It is free software under the GNU General Public License.
The library provides a wide range of mathematical routines such as
random number generators, special functions and least-squares fitting.
There are over 1000 functions in total with an extensive test suite.

dependent_to.name: tcoffee
dependent_to.description: T-Coffee is a multiple sequence alignment program.

dependent_to.name: mirdeep2
dependent_to.description:
miRDeep2 is a completely overhauled tool which discovers microRNA genes
by analyzing sequenced RNAs.

dependent_to.name: shortstack
dependent_to.description:
ShortStack is a tool developed to process and analyze smallRNA-seq data
with respect to a reference genome, and output a comprehensive and
informative annotation of all discovered small RNA genes.

dependent_to.name: cleaveland4
dependent_to.description:
CleaveLand4: Analysis of degradome data to find sliced miRNA and siRNA
targets
